author: oneowner
content: I'm having good luck with Win10 on my netbook and it was great on the HP.  I'm awaiting a new Dell with Win10 and I'm hoping to have very good luck with it as far as speed and dependability are concerned.  It's a desktop which I think should be a good tool for editing and I never considered a laptop.  I like Win10 and I'm not getting paid to endorse it.
